name: ros-dev-toolkit
description: A VS Code extension for ROS development â€“ create packages, build & run nodes, and visualize the ROS graph.

rosDevToolkit.rosSetupPath.description: Path to your ROS setup.bash (e.g. /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash). If empty, the extension will auto-detect and fall back to ~/.bashrc.

rosDevToolkit.launchInExternalTerminal.description: Launch ROS launch files in an external terminal window so GUI apps (RViz, Gazebo, rqt) can display correctly.

rosDevToolkit.preLaunchBuildCheck.description: When enabled, automatically check whether packages need rebuilding before launching. Disable to skip the build check and launch directly.

rosDevToolkit.symlinkInstall.description: Use --symlink-install when building with colcon. This avoids full rebuilds for ament_python packages when only .py, launch, or config files change.

rosDevToolkit.defaultMaintainerName.description: Default maintainer name used for new ROS packages. If empty, Git user.name is used or the extension prompts once.

rosDevToolkit.defaultMaintainerEmail.description: Default maintainer email used for new ROS packages. If empty, Git user.email is used or the extension prompts once.

rosDevToolkit.nodeVisualizerAutoRefreshI.description: Node Visualizer auto-refresh frequency in milliseconds.

rosDevToolkit.graphListTimeoutSeconds.description: Timeout (seconds) for ROS graph list commands used by refresh (nodes/topics/services/actions/parameters).

rosDevToolkit.nodeInfoTimeoutSeconds.description: Timeout (seconds) for ROS node info queries in the Node Visualizer.

rosDevToolkit.topicInfoTimeoutSeconds.description: Timeout (seconds) for ROS topic info queries in the Node Visualizer.
